name: Psychopomp High
description:
From the mind of Mary Borsellino comes Psychopomp High, a story of love and identity set in a high school of the dead. Caleb is a psychopomp with no memory of who he was in life. It doesn't take him long to meet and befriend Luke and Marcella, two fellow psychopomps with their own secrets.

–The Absolute Mag

A boy/girl or boy/boy dating sim. Friendship, love, and grim reaping.

For full credit information please see http://www.psychopomphigh.com/

Please note that Psychopomp High carries a content warning for non-explicit references to murder, sexual assault, and car accidents
